original_title: Kah kqyrsha përpjetë, e shihsha veten përfuni
overview: Home is a feeling, they say, but where is home, when you are not allowed to feel at home even within your own body and mind?  As I Was Looking Above, I Could See Myself Underneath unveils intimate stories of LGBTQ persons from Kosovo, going through their unceasing search for a safe place that allows them to be.
title: As I Was Looking Above, I Could See Myself Underneath
